ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | esumel.1 | |- F/ k ph |
| 2 |  | esumel.2 | |- F/_ k A |
| 3 |  | esumel.3 | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 4 |  | esumel.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_ex | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A -> B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_ralrimi | |- ( ph -> A. k e. A B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_esumcl | |- ( ( A e. V /\ A. k e. A B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) -> sum* k e. A B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 6, 7 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> sum* k e. A B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_snidg | |- ( sum* k e. A B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) -> sum* k e. A B e. { sum* k e. A B } ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> sum* k e. A B e. { sum* k e. A B } ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) = ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ k ( 0 [,] +oo ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( k e. A |-> B ) = ( k e. A |-> B ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 12, 4, 13 | #P_fmptdF | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> B ) : A --> ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_inss1 | |- ( ~P A i^i Fin ) C_ ~P A |
| 16 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) ) -> x e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_sseldi | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) ) -> x e. ~P A ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_elpwid | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) ) -> x C_ A ) |
| 19 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ k x |
| 20 | 2, 19 | #P_resmptf | |- ( x C_ A -> ( ( k e. A |-> B ) |` x ) = ( k e. x |-> B ) ) |
| 21 | 18, 20 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) ) -> ( ( k e. A |-> B ) |` x ) = ( k e. x |-> B ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) ) -> ( k e. x |-> B ) = ( ( k e. A |-> B ) |` x ) ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) ) -> ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) gsum ( k e. x |-> B ) ) = ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) gsum ( ( k e. A |-> B ) |` x ) ) ) |
| 24 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 23 | #P_esumval | |- ( ph -> sum* k e. A B = sup ( ran ( x e. ( ~P A i^i Fin ) |-> ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) gsum ( ( k e. A |-> B ) |` x ) ) ) , RR* , < ) ) |
| 25 | 11, 3, 14, 24 | #P_xrge0tsmsd | |- ( ph -> ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( k e. A |-> B ) ) = { sum* k e. A B } ) |
| 26 | 10, 25 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> sum* k e. A B e. ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( k e. A |-> B ) ) ) |
